name: Alien Culture
description: The game was developed alongside Sean Pindar (@Lord_Pindar) to deliver an interview simulator to teach players about Geert Hofstede's Cultural Dimension Theory for four specific cultures. The game used several Game Based Learning Theory to help players learn about how different cultures in business situations. The game is to be used at Abertay University's Dundee Business School Summer School between 27th June - 1st July. All content was developed for Abertay University and is covered by its IP Protection Policy
